nodes.text: Crimson Talon was the name of an Imperial Walker manufactured by the reconstituted Sith Empire. In 3630 BBY it was part of the forces brought by the Empress Acina to Iokath.

Crimson Talon appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during the War on Iokath. If the player chooses the ally with the Empire, which is neither a Light Side or Dark Side choice, the walker is upgraded with Iokath technology and the player pilots it during the assault on the Republic base.
